keyMoments.title: Allied Captain Stabs Whitebeard
keyMoments.description: Squard, an allied captain under Whitebeard's banner, stabs him after being manipulated by Akainu.
keyMoments.significance: Tests the loyalty and bonds within Whitebeard's fleet, ultimately strengthening them when Whitebeard forgives Squard.

keyMoments.title: Whitebeard Rallies His Forces
keyMoments.description: After proving his loyalty by creating escape routes, Whitebeard rallies all his pirates and allied crews.
keyMoments.significance: Restores morale and demonstrates the strength of their familial bonds.
